name: Obi Toppin
description:
Obi Toppin's full name is Obadiah Richard Toppin Jr.

Obi Toppin is open about his relationship with Christ.

Obi Toppin has a tattoo of a cross.

Obi Toppin...

Unless you're a keen basketball observer, you probably don't know who Obi Toppin is. He is a one-time college basketball All-American, a slam dunk champion, even the national Player of the Year! He was drafted by his hometown New York Knicks, but didn't exactly excel there. Toppin now plays for the Indiana Pacers, where he is mostly a reserve, but is putting up respectable numbers.

Obi Toppin talks to Christ every single day!

Obi Toppin has a Jewish mother.

So did Christ?
